name: Lawn Lord
description:
Quick game made when I really wanted to do yard work, but my grass wasn't long enough yet. I'm open to all suggestions for expanding/adjusting features.

UPDATE 1.0: The Lawn Lore is beginning to take shape! I have added music (credit to my good friend DonnieLo on Soundcloud. Music should start at 500 score but sometimes glitches and doesn't kick in). 

There is now a secret area to find! I will give a hint that it has to do with the main game's end screen. Mow on, now!
